header.title: Bufo Alvarius Screening
header.subtitle: Thank you for your interest in this sacred work.
header.description: Before we go further, we begin with a screening to understand your medical background, current emotional state, and what's calling you to this journey. This medicine is powerful and not for everyone â€” safety and alignment come first.

success.title: Thank You
success.subtitle: Your screening has been received.
success.description: We'll review your answers carefully and get back to you within 48 hours. This is a sacred process, and we take the time to feel into each application with presence and care.
success.nextSteps: If we move forward, we'll send you a consent and liability form to complete before we schedule preparation sessions.
success.closing: In the meantime, trust your journey.

q1.label: 1. What is calling you to this experience right now?
q1.placeholder: Share what's drawing you to this work...

q2.label: 2. Have you worked with any plant medicines or psychedelics before?
q2.hint: (Ayahuasca, psilocybin, LSD, MDMA, ketamine, Bufo, etc.)
q2.placeholder: If yes, please describe your experiences...

q3.label: 3. Do you have any medical conditions?
q3.hint: (Heart conditions, high blood pressure, asthma, neurological conditions, etc.)
q3.placeholder: Please list any medical conditions or write 'None'...

q4.label: 4. Are you currently taking any medications?
q4.hint: Especially: SSRIs, MAOIs, antidepressants, antipsychotics, benzodiazepines
q4.placeholder: Please list all current medications or write 'None'...

q5.label: 5. Any history of bipolar, schizophrenia, psychosis, or psychiatric hospitalization?
q5.placeholder: Please share any relevant history or write 'No'...

q6.label: 6. How has your mental/emotional state been in the last 3 months?
q6.placeholder: Describe your recent emotional and mental state...

q7.label: 7. Are you currently going through major life stress?
q7.hint: (Recent breakup, death of loved one, trauma, depression, job loss, etc.)
q7.placeholder: Share any significant life events or stressors...

q8.label: 8. What is your intention for this journey?
q8.placeholder: What do you hope to explore, heal, or understand?

q9.label: 9. Have you ever had panic attacks or strong anxiety?
q9.placeholder: Describe any history with anxiety or panic...

q10.label: 10. Do you feel grounded and supported in your life right now?
q10.placeholder: Do you have a support system? Do you feel stable?

q11.label: 11. Anything else you'd like to share?
q11.placeholder: Any additional context, questions, or things you want us to know...

notice.text: This screening helps ensure your safety and readiness. Bufo Alvarius is a powerful medicine with real contraindications. Honest answers protect both of us and allow us to guide you properly. All information is kept strictly confidential.
